en.title: [2023] Informal Sector Workforce
en.description: Biennial profile of employment in the informal sector, with breakdowns by key demographic and socioeconomic variables.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest biennial profile of employment in the informal sector, with breakdowns by key demographic and socioeconomic variables.

bm.title: [2023] Tenaga Buruh Sektor Informal
bm.description: Profil dwi-tahunan tenaga buruh di sektor informal, dengan pecahan mengikut ciri demografi dan sosioekonomi penting.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan profil dwi-tahunan tenaga buruh di sektor informal yang terkini, dengan pecahan mengikut ciri demografi dan sosioekonomi penting.
